item1.title: B NPO: Visitor acceptance vote

step0.txtIntro:
You can apply by entering the required information.
Reading the QR code at the time of admission will make the entry even easier.

step2.txtIntro: Select the application content(s) and tap [Next]
step2.prompt: Please choose at least a procedure!

step3.txtIntro: If you agree with the following contents, tap [Agree and continue]

step4.txtIntro:
If you have a QR code when entering the agency, please read it.
You can also proceed without reading it.
step4.note: *Information can be inherited by reading the QR code, and it is possible to reduce the number of input items after that.
